channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ending the H-1B Visa Lottery Is a Good Step
item.description: Our immigration policies should align with our nation’s interests.

item.title: Trump raises tariffs on slew of U.S. trading partners

item.title: Grassley: Durham Docs Show FBI ‘Never Followed Up On’ Important Info Exposing Russia Hoax

item.title: Biden judge blocks Trump from ending deportation amnesty for Honduras, Nicaragua, Nepal
item.description: A federal judge ordered Homeland Security to continue a deportation amnesty for migrants from Honduras, Nicaragua and Nepal, slamming President Trump ...

item.title: Trump calls on Senate to stay in D.C. to vote on more than 150 nominees
item.description: President Trump wants the Senate to stay in session until it clears a backlog of more than 150 judicial and executive-branch nominees.

item.title: Trump revives Presidential Fitness Test alongside famous athletes at White House event
item.description: President Trump on Thursday revived the Presidential Fitness Test in public schools, saying it was to ensure young Americans are healthy and active.

item.title: No Hope for a NASA Revival
item.description: It’s not just red tape holding back government-funded exploration and innovation. It’s a new cultural pessimism about the future.

item.title: Docs: Clinton Team Denied Knowledge Of Russia Hoax Despite Email Saying She ‘Approved’ Plan
item.description: Clinton told officials that the July 2016 declassified Sensitive Intelligence Material 'looked like Russian disinformation.'

item.title: Trump Is Right to Point the Finger at Hamas for Gaza Woes
item.description: Hamas has long demonstrated that it is willing to put its own population at risk knowing that the world will always blame Israel.

item.title: FBI Said Evidence Wasn’t Enough To Investigate Obama AG, Then Investigated Trump With Far Less

item.title: The Boys of Summer
item.description: This is baseball practice for my kids, but something else for me.

item.title: The Hidden Costs of Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: Imposing tariffs diverts resources to lobbying efforts that could have been used for productive purposes.
